attributes.action: Actually do something for the working people of Britain rather than taking from them and giving to immigrants, MP's, road...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is about time that the honest, hard working public is given something instead of the money we earn going to immigrants, MP's wages and rises, those on benefits able to work, but prefer to live off the working state, stupid ideas of 'Pay as you go' roads. Why should the money we work damn hard for benefit others, and we get back nothing but more screwing over for more money for frankly stupid ideas! 

I want my taxes to be used sensibly as after all , it's my hard earned cash that the government are using.

rejection.details: Please give a specific action for HM Government.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
